TEXT.TITLE: CANADA APPROVES U.S. GAS EXPORTS BY PROGAS
TEXT.BODY: ProGas Ltd was issued an export licence to sell 10.3 billion cubic meters of natural gas to Ocean State Power Co of Burrillville, Rhode Island, the federal energy department said. The sale, covering a 20 year period beginning May 1, 1989, was previously recommended by the National Energy Board. Contract terms were not released. Reuter
